comments.en:
Please use the new version 0.4.1 of this driver, version 0.3 is obsolete.

This driver supports the Lexmark 3200 ink jet "GDI" printers. It prints in monochrome, 4 ink colour and 6 ink colour (photo quality) mode. To do this, not only the Ghostscript driver "lxm3200c" is used, but also "lxm3200m" and "lxm3200p". The user chooses by an option which driver is really used.
